name: GoatIndex.ai
description: GoatIndex.ai is the leading data layer for the Solana AI ecosystem, designed to provide real-time, actionable trading signals and fully automated due diligence for early-stage Solana AI projects. With over 500+ indexed AI projects, it delivers detailed insights through an intuitive dashboard featuring metrics like mindshare, token analytics, GitHub activity, and more. Our focus is on empowering users with tools to navigate and evaluate opportunities at the earliest stages while maintaining safeguards through advanced filtering mechanisms. GoatIndex.ai bridges the gap between data accessibility and actionable intelligence for Solanaâ€™s growing AI landscape.
